## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4fb2c212daa3b898b2df5ffdf458a7751515e92268bd6b3b13ac45894235be3c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'gog-module-event-bus' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
